content:
PHASE 1 COORDINATION

Parallel task assignments for Phase 1 (Core Operations). Module ownership:

- Agent storage: owns notebook-store/src/store.rs extensions, repository pattern
- Agent causal: owns notebook-store/src/causal.rs (new), causal position logic
- Agent server: owns notebook-server/src/* (all files)
- Agent endpoints: owns HTTP route handlers in notebook-server after server setup

DEPENDENCY GRAPH:
```
Task 1.6 (server setup) ----\
                             \---> Tasks 1.3, 1.4, 1.5 (endpoints)
Task 1.1 (storage) ----+----/
                       |
Task 1.2 (causal) -----+
```

PARALLEL WAVE 1: Tasks 1.1, 1.2, 1.6 can start immediately
PARALLEL WAVE 2: Tasks 1.3, 1.4, 1.5 start after Wave 1 completes

RULES:
1. Each agent stays within owned files
2. Storage and causal agents coordinate on transaction boundaries
3. Server agent prepares middleware, endpoints agent adds routes
4. All agents reference Phase 0 types from notebook-core
author: orchestrator
